Shedden (1998): North-South regional shortening-> S over N low angle thrusts
Nguyen (1998) Kambalda area: North-South regional shortening-> south over north thrusts
Synthesised for Avoca: North -south regional shortening -> S over N thrusts

McCuaig (1999): E-W compression -> steep N to NNW trending reverse faults and folds
Shedden (1998): ENE regional shortening -> NNW trending open upright folds reverse thrusts along fold limbs
Nguyen (1998) Kambalda area: E-W shortening-> upright NNW trending, gently SE plunging folds.
Synthesised for Avoca: E-W compression -> steep N to NNW trending reverse faults and folds

McCuaig (1999): NE-SW compression -> dextral reactivation of D2 faults. Others thrust
Shedden (1998): ESE-WNW shortening-> sinistral shear zones along NNW structures low angle thrusts
Nguyen (1998) Kambalda area: Oblique-sinistral wrench faulting reverse shear zones
Synthesised for Avoca: ESE-WNW and NE-SW compressive events-> reactivation of reverse faults. Other thrust and faults variably dextral and sinistral movements.
